fields.name: id
fields.title: Dataset ID
fields.description: Dataset's unique identifier on the open government platform (CKAN). Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Dataset Title (English)
fields.description: Dataset's title in English. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: title_fr
fields.title: Dataset Title (French)
fields.description: Dataset's title in French. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: published
fields.title: Published
fields.description: Date the dataset was published (note: time part set to 0 for all records, as only day is known). Field retrieved from the open government platform and converted to a ISO8601 format with separator T.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: Modified
fields.description: Date the dataset was last modified. Field obtained by taking the latest of its resources's created and modified_metadata.

fields.name: metadata_created
fields.title: Metadata Created
fields.description: Date the dataset's metadata was created. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: metadata_modified
fields.title: Metadata Modified
fields.description: Date the dataset's metadata was last modified. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: num_resources
fields.title: Number of resources
fields.description: Number of resources associated. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: maintainer_email
fields.title: Maintainer Email
fields.description: Maintainer's email address. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: maintainer_name
fields.title: Maintainer Name
fields.description: Maintainer's name (may be a team). Field inferred from the maintainer's email. (Power BI report further this name, automatically)

fields.name: collection
fields.title: Collection
fields.description: Dataset's collection type. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: frequency
fields.title: Frequency
fields.description: Frequency of maintenance/updates given in ISO format (e.g. P2Y = every 2 year), with possible special values: 'continual', 'as_needed', 'irregular', 'not_planned' and 'unknown'. Field directly retrieved from the open government platform.

fields.name: harvested
fields.title: Harvested
fields.description: True if the dataset is harvested. Field directly retrieved from the catalogue's metadata field 'aafc_is_harvested'.

fields.name: internal
fields.title: Internal
fields.description: True if the dataset is only internal, i.e. not open. Field directly retrieved from the catalogue's metadata field 'publication' (equal to 'internal' or 'open_government').

fields.name: up_to_date
fields.title: Up to date
fields.description: Currency status: TRUE means dataset is up to date; FALSE means it needs an update. Field computed, based on 'frequency' and 'modified' columns.

fields.name: official_lang
fields.title: Official Languages
fields.description: Compliance with official languages requirements. Field computed by verifying if dataset has the same number of resources in English and in French.

fields.name: open_formats
fields.title: Open Format
fields.description: Compliance with open formats. Cannot be considered 100% accurate. Field computed by listing the dataset's resources distinct format types (e.g., Text Documents) and verifying if there is at least one resource in an open format for each of those format types.

fields.name: spec
fields.title: Specification
fields.description: Compliance with specification / data dictionary requirements. Cannot be considered 100% accurate. Field computed by checking that, if the dataset has any resource of resource type 'dataset' (e.g., a CSV), it also has a resource whose name contains 'data dictionary', 'specification', or starts/ends with 'dd_'/'_dd'.

fields.name: registry_link
fields.title: Registry Link
fields.description: URL to the dataset's page on the open registry (open.canada.ca).

fields.name: catalogue_link
fields.title: Catalogue Link
fields.description: URL to the dataset's page on AAFC Open Data Catalogue (https://data-catalogue-donnees.agr.gc.ca/dataset/). As some datasets are not on that catalogue, may return error 404.
